aws_fsx_lustre_file_system.description: Manages a FSx Lustre File System.

subnet_ids.description: A list of IDs for the subnets that the file system will be accessible from. File systems currently support only one subnet. The file server is also launched in that subnet's Availability Zone.

imported_file_chunk_size.description: For files imported from a data repository, this value determines the stripe count and maximum amount of data per file (in MiB

security_group_ids.description: A list of IDs for the security groups that apply to the specified network interfaces created for file system access. These security groups will apply to all network interfaces.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the file system.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name of the file system.

dns_name.description: DNS name for the file system, e.g. `fs-12345678.fsx.us-west-2.amazonaws.com`

id.description: Identifier of the file system, e.g. `fs-12345678`

network_interface_ids.description: Set of Elastic Network Interface identifiers from which the file system is accessible.

owner_id.description: AWS account identifier that created the file system.

vpc_id.description: Identifier of the Virtual Private Cloud for the file system.
